Posts.Title: 3cm Lump found, doctor is very concerned kdt412 Beesie

Posts.Content: kdt412 wrote: I recently found a lump, and went to my GYN on Tuesday. I explained my symptoms of kind of like a fullness or heaviness in breast and pain when touching lump. She immediately ordered a mammogram and ultrasound and told me that she did not like it. She said she was very concerned due to shape, edges, location and the fullness sensation I have. I will have the exams tomorrow, but I'm kind of freaking out. I am 42 with 2 boys(8&9 years old). I just don't know what to expect. Any suggestions? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 3cm Lump found, doctor is very concerned kdt412 Beesie
